Associate Professor in World Literatures at Durham University. Marxist literary criticism & environmental humanities, new peasantries, agroecology, post-capitalist futures. Views mine.

Director of the International Volcanic Health Hazard Network (www.ivhhn.org). Professor of Geohealth at Durham University, UK. PI of the FACE-UP Consortium. Working on air pollution & health protection related to volcanoes, cities, industrial exposures etc
Feral theorist. Anthropologist & sociologist by training, philosopher in practice, anti-disciplinary by choice. Associate professor, Durham University; migrant rep, Durham UCU. janabacevic.net

Writer and academic: photograpy, art, archives, museums, history. Italophile, tango dancer, and Professor of History & Visual Culture, Durham University, UK. Author of Treasured: How Tutankhamun Shaped a Century (Atlantic 2021) https://christinariggs.com
Health economist, health services and health policy researcher, long-term care, family caregiving. Department of Population Health Sciences Duke University and Durham ADAPT, Veterans Affairs.
